ComicInfo.Title: The Cobra's Venom Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Cobra's Venom Part 2: Doctor Venom's robot plows through Cobra's forces. The Snake Eyes robot offers to help the G.I. Joe team.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 09:30:30. [CVDB691852] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:37:09. [Issue ID 1882592]
ComicInfo.Colorist: James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,Jesse D. Heagy,James Brown
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),James Offredi,Jamie Sullivan,Jesse D. Heagy,John Royale,Ron Joseph
ComicInfo.Characters: Frag Vipers,Cobra [Doctor Mindbender,Snake Eyes robot,Milo,Cobra Commander,Vipers],G.I. Joe [Bomstrike,Sightline,Tele-Viper,Ambush],Techno Vipers,Doctor Venom,HEAT Vipers,Baroness
